attributes.action: ensure mental health service users and carers are listened to during the process of reviewing day services for adults with severe mental health rpoblems.  So we see a real improvement in services not just a cost cutting exercise which results in the closure of valued services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Current day service provision for adults with severe mental health problems has proven to be an important part of the recovery process for vulnerable individuals.  
We ask you to register your support for ensuring adult mental health service users and carers are listened to during the process of reviewing day services for people with severe mental health rpoblems.  So we see a real improvement in services not just a cost cutting exercise which results in the closure of valued services.
